text: Landsberg am Lech is a rural district in Upper Bavaria in the south of Bavaria, Germany. Neighbor districts are: Aichach-Friedberg, Fürstenfeldbruck Rural District, Starnberg Rural District, Weilheim-Schongau, Ostallgäu and Augsburg (district); Landsberg am Lech is the capital of Landsberg (district). == Towns and municipalities == Towns Municipalities #Landsberg am Lech #Apfeldorf #Denklingen #Dießen am Ammersee #Eching am Ammersee #Egling an der Paar #Eresing #Finning #Fuchstal #Geltendorf #Greifenberg #Hofstetten #Hurlach #Igling #Kaufering #Kinsau 16.
